title: PSA to all players that have Thresh on their team
body: Clicking the lantern is your responsibility. If you're in danger and Thresh throws a lantern at you, please click it. It can get you away from the bad hurty things. And for the love of god if you don't click it, don't blame the Thresh for your death.

replies.body:
Thresh sucks! Every time I'm in trouble, he just uses his useless lantern attack on the enemy, and his aim is so terrible he usually hits me with it!

(The above is of course a joke - my sympathies to all the Thresh players having to deal with those who don't know about the lantern).
It's not always that easy, if you're against a smart opponent they tend to stand on the lamp so you cannot use it to escape.

Lol, I know I deserved it, but this is what happened in my last game before I got banned (sidenote, 2 days to go, woo)! I was supporting an unskilled Jinx, verse an experienced Jinx and Blitz. She kept blaming me for not helping, even as I threw the lantern at her feet. MFW Thresh counters Blitz, but only if my ADC clicks the lantern. XD

Many flames back and forth later, I got banned. Deserved and won't do it again, especially not for any punk ADC, but seriously, Thresh is so widely used not, and Riot has pretty much labelled the lantern with all but glowing red arrows to tell you to click it, that people should know by now what to do. Yet I'm still having to explain it every game I play with him. Sigh...

ikr, they should just put some neo arrows pointing at it with a bright pink sign saying click it, the young kiddies don't seem to understand what the lantern does, one line "just click it, its not that hard" and 2 people reported that as abuse.

Exactly this, I hate it when I get blamed when they run past the lantern and die.

For example, I throw a lantern over the wall in front of them by like 2 centimeters so they don't have to run back, they just ignore it, run through lazer turret, and die. Then blame me for not throwing a lantern.
Thresh y u always W after i die {{summoner:3}}
I like the ADCs that can admit that they should've clicked the lantern.
What if Thresh throws a bad lantern?

What you mean those trolls or bad players who throw it when they are on the wrong side of the enemy? No, never, they wouldn't do that.

No matter what skill you use, they all have their ups and downs.
